Model

Class OwnableSpace

  • java.lang.Object
    • Model.Space
      • Model.OwnableSpace
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Property, Railroad, Utility

    public abstract class OwnableSpace
extends Space
    Ownable type extension of the Space class. Methods are defined for Player observation and manipulation while also providing for easier Space instance differentiation.

    The class is further divided into the classes Property, Railroad, and Utility.

    The associated identification number for each instance of OwnableSpace are detailed in the following:

    • Property.Property(int, int, int, int)
    • Railroad.Railroad(int, int)
    • Utility.Utility(int, int)
    See Also:
    OwnableSpace(int, int, String, double, double), Property, Railroad, Utility

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected double dMultiplier
      Double-precision floating point number that holds the multiplier for an instance's dRent value.
      protected double dRent
      Double-precision floating point number that holds the amount that should be paid whenever a Player that is not the owner lands on an instance of this class.
      protected double dWorth
      Double-precision floating point number that holds the total worth of an instance of this class.
      protected java.lang.String NAME
      String that represents the name of an instance of this class.
      protected int OWNABLE_ID
      Integer that is used for identification.
      protected Player owner
      Player object that holds the owner of an instance of this class.
      protected double PRICE
      Double-precision floating point number that holds the price of an instance of this class.

    • Field Detail

      • OWNABLE_ID

        protected final int OWNABLE_ID
        Integer that is used for identification. The value set for this attribute is highly dependent on the subclass that calls the constructor of this superclass.

      • NAME

        protected final java.lang.String NAME
        String that represents the name of an instance of this class.

      • PRICE

        protected final double PRICE
        Double-precision floating point number that holds the price of an instance of this class. It is used whenever a Player buys an object of type OwnableSpace

      • owner

        protected Player owner
        Player object that holds the owner of an instance of this class.

      • dRent

        protected double dRent
        Double-precision floating point number that holds the amount that should be paid whenever a Player that is not the owner lands on an instance of this class.

      • dWorth

        protected double dWorth
        Double-precision floating point number that holds the total worth of an instance of this class. For Property instances, this attribute is subject to change throught development.

      • dMultiplier

        protected double dMultiplier
        Double-precision floating point number that holds the multiplier for an instance's dRent value.

    • Constructor Detail

      • OwnableSpace

        public OwnableSpace(int nLocationIndex,
                    int nID,
                    java.lang.String strName,
                    double dPrice,
                    double dRent)
        Constructor for an OwnableSpace object that is called by its subclasses only.
        Parameters:
        nLocationIndex - Integer that holds the index where the OwnableSpace object will be placed on a Board's boardSpaces attribute.
        nID - Integer that holds the identification number of an OwnableSpace.
        strName - String that holds the name of an OwnableSpace.
        dPrice - Double-precision floating point number that holds the price of an OwnableSpace.
        dRent - Double-precision floating point number that holds the rent of an OwnableSpace.

    • Method Detail

      • canBeBought

        public boolean canBeBought(Player currPlayer)
        Method that checks if an OwnableSpace instance can be bought by a Player if they choose to do so.
        Parameters:
        currPlayer - Player instance that is active in the Game turn.
        Returns:
        Boolean variable that determines whether the currPlayer parameter will have enough cash after the buyProperty() call.

      • addToWorth

        public void addToWorth(double toAdd)
        Equivalent setter method for the dWorth attribute of this class. Instead of changing the entire value of the attribute, a certain amount is added to the current value.
        Parameters:
        toAdd - Double-precision floating point number holding the amount to be added to the dWorth attribute of an OwnableSpace

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Overriden toString() method from the Object class. Used only in program testing and confirmation.

        Returns:
        String representation of the attributes of this class.

      • toStringShort

        public java.lang.String toStringShort()
        Modified toString method that returns only the string representation of an instance's NAME, dPrice, and dRent. Used in presenting basic data to the program user.
        Returns:
        String representation of the basic attributes of this class.
